product_name: Igloo Super Tough STX-54 Sportsman Cooler - 54 qt.
long_description: The 54 qt. Igloo Super Tough STX-54 Sportsman Cooler is built to meet your needs when car camping, fishing or heading to the work site. It'll keep your food cold for up to 5 days in 90degF heat. Rugged polyethylene construction with foam in the lid and the body provides excellent insulation. 54 qt. capacity holds 78 12-oz. cans; cooler is tall enough to fit 2-liter bottles upright. Rugged, wide integrated handles are easy to grasp with gloves on; bolt-through handles won't pull out even under heavy loads. Stainless-steel latch endures regular use. Threaded, tethered drain plug allows for quick draining and easy cleaning; threads are compatible with a hose for draining away from the area of use. Lid on the Igloo Super Tough STX-54 Sportsman Cooler includes a measuring scale for determining whether or not your fish is a keeper.
short_description: The 54 qt. Igloo Super Tough STX-54 Sportsman Cooler is built to meet your needs when car camping, fishing or heading to the work site. It'll keep your food cold for up to 5 days in 90degF heat.
